title: CreatorofTronWinner
author: CreatorofTronWinner
content: Sir Waldorf77 spread misleading information and make it look bad.btw..Im the ADMIN of the project.However now here is the full info with all the details: *üíé Win TRON ¬† üéÅüéÅüéÅ**It's fast secure and instant process with 30% insurance protection+extra rewards !! *Your entire single bet is 100% maximum amount you can lose of your entire placed single bet are 70% you receive 30% back minimum amount everyday If you play everyday.After placing the bet you receive cashback minimum 30% up to 1000% in 24h.+ Loyalty Bonuses and Extra Rewards.Winnings and your TRON rewards are automatically paid out in to the same tron ‚Äã‚Äãwallet from where the bets placed.*Your placed bet are protected by our TRON WINNER 30% cash back insurance.*For example: with 1000 trx bet you get minimum 300 trx back in 24 hours so with placed bet 1000 trx you could lose maximum of 700 trx the 300 trx wich is 30% is protected with our insurance and after placing bet you receive 30% TRON back in to your TRON wallet in 24h.*The bet are your single transaction what you make on tron blockchain.* ¬† ¬†please dont use exchanger wallets! Hold your own keys...*We recommend to use tronlink pro wallet**After sending just wait you will receive funds in your TRON wallet **You receive tron in 24hours If you have not received by that time then contact with support!!*¬†¬† ¬† ¬†üéÅüéÅüéÅAlso we have nice extra TRON Gifts for those who's long term players and loyal customers.Chat with other tron winners:https://t.me/+P6_LzUsh7dkxOTA0More players more TRON Rewards for everybody üëç share and invite others in directly by link: https://t.me/dailytronwinnerRead more info about rules and our service here https://t.me/+hB1iAh5mRrxjYmVkWe have mixed the 5 aspects in crypto: gambling/staking/investing/ crypto rewards and crypto airdrops.So the final outcome is Super!

comments.author: Text
comments.body: This is no different from money-doubling scams. Promises of high returns, rewards, and passive income are unrealistic. To all the newbies reading this, please avoid investing or depositing your Tron in this. I don't see any betting here; its pure intention is just to collect Tron. I've read and encountered many similar cases on Telegram before, and all of them turned out to be fraudulent.

Of course, that bet of mine is going to lose 100% if I gamble but that sounds reassuring that if I gamble, I'd definitely going to lose money and first time to see that I've get a money back guarantee if I lose my bets. As if that I'll literally and assured that I'll lose money if I go on your platform and do it everyday. That doesn't sound fun at all. And where is your website? why there's an insurance? Seems that everything is interconnecting like what others said.
